translation.text: State Elevator 802 (Oak Grove platform to Forest Hills, Wonderland platforms) unavailable
Please use adjacent State Street Elevator 967.

Routes 210 and 238 are detoured due to construction at Quincy Adams busway. Buses will pick up/drop off on Independence Ave where customers may use the existing pedestrian pathway to access Quincy Adams Station.

Connections in both directions can be made at:
Franklin St @ Water St
Independence Ave @ Verchild St (Route 230 stops)
Centre St @ Liberty St

Missed stops:
Liberty St @ Water St (outbound)
Liberty St @ Penn St (outbound)
Quincy Adams (outbound)
Quincy Adams (inbound)
Liberty St @ Penn St (inbound)
Liberty St @ Water St (inbound)

Learn more at: mbta.com/southshore

The two outer lanes at the Quincy Adams Garage toll plaza over Centre St are closed until further notice. Repairing the bridge is part of the South Shore Garage Project. More: https://www.mbta.com/south-shore-garages
The Alewife Garage may have additional spaces taken to accelerate repairs while the demand for parking is low. Once parking demand increases, these spaces will be made available again to our riders.
South Station Pedal & Park is closed due to construction. Bicycle racks are currently available on Atlantic Ave adjacent to the South Station main entrance.
Route 325 service remains suspended until further notice. Riders can use Routes 100 or 101 to connect to the Orange Line for downtown service.
Route 326 service remains suspended until further notice. Riders can use Routes 94, 95, 101, or 134 to connect to the Orange Line or Red Line for downtown service.
Route 352 service remains suspended until further notice. Riders can use Route 350 to connect to the Red Line or Route 354 for service to downtown Boston and North Burlington.
Route 170 service remains suspended until further notice
Route 434 service remains suspended until further notice
Route 503 service remains suspended until further notice. Route 501 is extended to serve Copley Sq/Back Bay as an alternative.
Route 502 service remains suspended until further notice. For alternate service, use Route 504
The Hancock Street lot is closed to allow for the construction of the North Quincy Garage. As an alternative, over 300 spaces are available in the Newport Avenue lot.

The Quincy Adams parking garage has re-opened with 500 spaces available. Additional spaces will be added as construction finishes up. Customers can access the garage via the Route 3 off ramp exit. The Burgin Parkway entrance remains closed.

Beginning November 29, the parking lot across from the station will close. Please use the garage or adjacent surface lot as an alternative.

The Quincy Adams Garage drop-off and pick-up location will remain at its location within Level 1B. 

The garage will be PayByPhone / PayByPlate with no need to pay to exit. More information on how to pay for parking is available at mbta.com/parking. 

Affected routes:
Red Line
Route 212 service remains suspended until further notice. Route 217 service operates via Billings Rd.
Route 465 service remains suspended until further notice. Seek alternate service with MBTA.com/trip-planner
Route 710 service remains suspended until further notice. Use Routes 99, 100, 101 or 134 as alternatives.

Commuter Rail service at South Attleboro is temporarily suspended due to significant deterioration of the pedestrian overpass. Service will resume & the pedestrian overpass will reopen when the station Accessibility Improvement Project is fully completed.
Local GATRA and RIPTA bus service at the station will not be impacted. Riders may also consider Attleboro Station as a temporary alternative.

The Braintree Parking Garage has re-opened with 350 parking spots available.  Additional spaces will be added as construction finishes up. The surface lot on Ivory St will remain open as an alternate parking option.

Riders can continue to use PayByPhone or pay-by-plate with the same parking fees as other MBTA surface lots.

Affected routes:
Red Line
Courthouse Escalator 415 (Airport/Design Center platform to lobby) unavailable due to maintenance
Courthouse Escalator 417 (Airport/Design Center platform to south lobby) unavailable due to maintenance
The Haymarket Busway is closed due to construction. Routes 92, 93, 426 and 450 will board/alight on Congress St. Routes 111 and 117 will board/alight on Surface Road.

The Route 128 Garage is undergoing repairs and renovations. Level 1 is currently closed to parking and can be used for pick up and drop off only. Level 2 - 4 access is available only from University Ave. This will be in place through October 2022.

Lynn Parking Garage arcade stairs 1 and 2 are closed until further notice due to structural issues. Customers may exit the garage via elevators to the ground level or by using the south stairs located on the Market street side of the garage.
Vehicular access to the upper 2 levels of the garage is restricted. The garage has sufficient parking capacity to accommodate daily demand.
Route 34E detoured due to construction. Connect at Main St @ Stone St and 624 Washington St opp Bird Middle School.

Affected direction: Inbound

Bypassed stops:
East St @ Main St
East St @ School St
East St @ Diamond St
East St @ Eastover Rd
710 East St opp Kendall St
High Plain St @ Peach St

Connections:
Main St @ Stone St
624 Washington St opp Bird Middle School
The Upper Parking Lot at Worcester Station is closed with the exception to accessible parking, due to construction.
The stop at Washington St @ Grove St has temporarily moved to 5223 Washington St due to construction.

Effective Mon, March 14th & until the Worcester Union Station Improvement Project is completed, passengers board & exit trains on a temporary platform at the east end of the station accessible from 45 Shrewsbury Street. Please allow for extra travel time.
Bowdoin Escalator 125 (Lobby to street) unavailable due to maintenance
The following stop is closed through May 2023 due to construction: Somerville Ave @ Spring St. Customers can use the stop at Somerville Ave @ Central St or Somerville Ave @ Lowell St.
Oak Grove Elevator 800 (Busway, Commuter Rail, parking lot to lobby) unavailable due to maintenance

A shuttle bus will be available, upon request, to transport customers between Oak Grove and Wellington. To exit, exit the train at Wellington and find station personnel or use a station call box to request the shuttle bus to Oak Grove. To board, find station personnel or use a station call box to request the shuttle bus to Wellington. Alternatively, customers may utilize the Oak Grove Elevator 744 located at the station entrance on Washington Street.
Broadway Escalator 372 (Unpaid lobby to street) unavailable until further notice.
Courthouse Elevator 937 (South Station platform to lobby) unavailable due to maintenance

To exit, exit the bus at South Station and proceed to the Airport/Design Center/Chelsea platform, then take an SL1, SL2 or SL3 bus outbound to Courthouse and use Courthouse Elevator 938. To board, use Courthouse Elevator 938 to access the Airport/Design Center/Chelsea platform. Take an SL1, SL2 or SL3 bus outbound to World Trade Center, then proceed to the South Station platform and transfer to an inbound SL1, SL2 or SL3 bus.
Route 50 detoured due to construction. Nearest outbound connections are West St @ Austin St or River St @ Hyde Park Ave. Nearest inbound connections are Hyde Park Ave @ Oak St or West St @ Austin St.

Affected stops:
Alwin St @ Dedham Pkwy (outbound)
Austin St @ Myopia Rd (outbound)
Alwin St @ Leighton Rd (outbound)
Alwin St @ Turtle Pond Pkwy (outbound)
Austin St @ Chestnut St (outbound)
Austin St @ Gordon Ave (outbound)
272 Reservation Rd opp Brainard St (outbound)
Reservation Rd @ Thompson St (outbound)
Reservation Rd @ River St (outbound)
River St @ Adams St (outbound)
River St @ Radford Pl (outbound)
River St @ Hyde Park Ave (inbound)
Gordon Ave @ Summer St (inbound)
11 Summer St (inbound)
61 Summer St opp Parrott St (inbound)
Summer St @ West St (inbound)

Route 33 detoured due to construction. Inbound connections can be made at Reservation Rd @ River St & Cleary Sq. Outbound connections will be on the inbound route. There is no service along River St between Reservation Rd and Hyde Park Ave.

Affected stops:
River St @ Hyde Park Ave (outbound)
Hyde Park Ave @ Westminster St (outbound)
Hyde Park Ave @ West St (outbound)
Hyde Park Ave opp Webster St (outbound)
Hyde Park Ave @ Winthrop St (outbound)
Reservation Rd @ River St (outbound)
River St @ Perkins Ave (outbound)
229 Reservation Rd opp Thompson St (outbound)
Reservation Rd @ Brainard St (outbound)
River St @ Winslow St (outbound)
River St @ Reservation Rd (outbound)
Alwin St @ Stonehill Rd (outbound)
Alwin St opp Leighton Rd (outbound)
River St @ Church St (outbound)
Opposite 1608 River St (outbound)
Alwin St @ Dedham Pkwy (outbound)
River St @ Turtle Pond Pkwy (outbound)
Dedham Pkwy opp Georgetowne Dr (outbound)
Turtle Pond Pkwy @ Alwin St (outbound)
Turtle Pond Pkwy opp Bajko Rink (outbound)
Turtle Pond Pkwy @ Fairview Ave (outbound)
River St opp Neponset Valley Pkwy (outbound)
Neponset Valley Parkway @ Readville St (outbound)
1799 River St opp Norton St (outbound)
Neponset Valley Pkwy @
Route 216 detoured for paving. Connections can be made at Taffrail Rd @ Bicknell St. & Bicknell St @ Yardarm Ln.

Affected direction: Outbound

Affected stops:
Bicknell St @ O'Brien Towers Driveway
O'Brien Towers
O'Brien Towers Driveway @ Bicknell St
Bicknell St @ Binnacle Lane
Route 556 inbound is bypassing 184 Hammond St due to construction. Connect at Tomlin St @ Summit St & Hammond St @ Plympton St.

Affected direction: Inbound

Affected stops:
184 Hammond St

Route 450 inbound trips departing Salem at 10:15 PM and 11:15 PM on Fridays will use the Ted Williams Tunnel to get to Haymarket Station. This detour is necessary due to the weekend closure of the Sumner Tunnel for MassDOT maintenance.
CT3, 8 and 47 notice: The stop at 88 E Newton St has closed for construction. Passengers can use the stop at Harrison Ave @ E Newton St.
The door to enter the Forest Hills Pedal and Park is not functioning. We are working to have it addressed as quickly as possible,
Route 137 inbound is detoured due to water main work and is omitting Washington St @ Eliot St. Connections can be made at Walkers Brook Dr @ New Crossing Rd or Reading Depot.

Effective October 1st, Lynn Station is closed in order to be rebuilt as part of the Lynn Commuter Rail Station Improvements Project. A free shuttle bus service is provided between Lynn and Swampscott until a temporary platform is built.

During the station closure, riders may use Bus Routes 441/442 and 455 from Lynn to connect to Wonderland station for continued Blue Line subway service into Boston.

Although Swampscott is a Zone 3 station, Lynn riders who board at Swampscott may purchase Zone 2 tickets and passes.

For more info: MBTA.com/projects/lynn-commuter-rail-station-improvements 



Affected stops:
Lynn
Sullivan Square Escalator 307 (Forest Hills platform to paid lobby) unavailable due to maintenance
Community College Escalator 305 (Platform to paid lobby) unavailable due to maintenance
Sullivan Square Escalator 308 (Oak Grove platform to paid lobby) unavailable due to maintenance
Access to Sydney St from the south side of JFK/UMass station is closed. Customers can use Old Colony Ave/busway or the Sydney St entrance south of Columbia Rd.
The Route 553/554 stop at Elm St @ Washington St has permanently closed. Please use the stops at Washington St @ Cherry St or Elm St @ Webster St as alternatives.
The outbound stop at South Bay Mall @ Target has permanently moved west on Allstate Rd to across from the inbound stop at South Bay Mall @ Target.
Green Line Extension riders will need to validate their fare prior to boarding at a fare vending machine. Please see station personnel if you need assistance.

Affected stops:
Medford/Tufts
Union Square
Ball Square
Magoun Square
Gilman Square
East Somerville
Lechmere
Alewife Escalator 353 (Main concourse to busway) unavailable due to maintenance
North Station Elevator 731 (Passageway to Causeway Street) unavailable due to maintenance

To exit, use North Station Elevator 912 located in the lobby to access the corner of Haverhill St and Causeway St. To board, cross Causeway St, and at the corner of Haverhill St and Causeway St, use North Station Elevator 912 to access the lobby.
The Columbia Rd entrance and access to Sydney St from the south side of the station is closed. Customers can use Old Colony Ave/busway or the Sydney St entrance south of Columbia Rd.
Accessible van service is available to transport riders between the Columbia Rd entrance and the JFK/UMass busway during the concourse closure. Riders should see station personnel for assistance.

The new Pawtucket/Central Falls station (Zone 8) will open for service on Monday, January 23rd. A new Providence Line schedule will go into effect on the same day as a result. The new Providence Line Fall/Winter schedule is available online.
The station is located at 300 Pine Street in Pawtucket, RI, 02860
Prudential Escalator 152 (Heath Street platform to lobby) unavailable due to maintenance
Summer St @ Drydock Ave is now the new last stop on the Route 4 inbound and the first stop on the Route 4 outbound.

Mon, January 23, a new Franklin/Foxboro Line schedule will go into effect. This schedule adjustment will prevent train traffic between Readville & South Station after the opening of Pawtucket station (Prov Line) and offer improved on-time performance.
The new Franklin/Foxboro Line Winter schedule is now available online and in South Station or Back Bay.

Buses will replace regular weekday & weekend train service between Haverhill & Reading from Feb 4 through Feb 12 & from March 4 through March 12 to allow for signal improvement work. Normal train service will operate between Reading & North Station.

-A dedicated schedule will be in effect during the disruption. 
-Buses will be accessible, but bikes are not allowed on board.
-Buses will be free but passengers are expected to purchase regular fares for travel between Reading and North Station.
Harvard Elevator 821 (Lobby to Harvard Square) unavailable due to maintenance
To exit, use Harvard Elevator 973 located at the end of upper busway. To board, use Harvard Elevator 973 located at the corner of Brattle St and Brattle Sq.

The Route 71 & 73 stop at Mt Auburn St @ Mt Auburn Hospital will be moving opposite Channing St due to construction on Jan 14 - 15, Jan 21 - 22, and Jan 28 - 29. Riders can use the temporary stop or Mt Auburn St opp Sparks St.
Route 85 detoured due to construction and is omitting Spring Hill. Service will originate and terminate at Summer St @ School St.

Affected direction: Outbound

Affected stops:
117 Summer St
Summer St opp Carter Terr
Avon St @ Central St
Route 120 inbound is detoured due to Maverick St being closed between Orleans St and Bremen St. No stops are missed, but allow extra time.
Back Bay Escalator 144 (Commuter Rail track 2 to lobby) unavailable from Mon Jan 23 through Tue Jan 24 due to maintenance
Orange Line: Riders will experience longer wait times while we operate with a reduced fleet. We appreciate our riders' patience as we work to address the issue and apologize for any inconvenience
Porter Elevator 987 (Red Line platforms to lobby) unavailable due to maintenance
For continued service, find station personnel or use a station call box to request the shuttle bus to Davis.

The Green Line and Orange Line will be bypassing Haymarket station in both directions this weekend, Jan 21 - 22, to allow for work on the Government Center Garage demolition project. An accessible shuttle will be available upon demand.
Please see station personnel or use a station call box to request shuttle service.

Contrary to previous communications, the station entrances at Natick Center Station will not be relocated to Washington Street on January 23. Passengers should continue to use the North Avenue and Walnut Street entrances until further notice.
Ruggles Escalator 136 (Orange Line platform to upper lobby) unavailable due to maintenance
The stop at Dalton St @ Boylston St will be moving to Dalton St @ Belvidere St in front of the Sheraton Hotel beginning Jan 21, until further notice, due to construction.
The stop at Highland Ave @ Central St will be closed the week of Jan 23 - 27 for road work. Use the stops at Highland Ave @ Benton Rd or Highland Ave @ Trull Ln as alternatives.
North Station Escalator 393 (Oak Grove platform to Causeway Street lobby) unavailable due to maintenance
Courthouse Escalator 412 (Lobby to mezzanine) unavailable due to maintenance
Courthouse Escalator 418 (Lobby to Seaport Boulevard, Fan Pier Boulevard) unavailable due to maintenance
Charles/MGH Escalator 425 (Lobby to Ashmont/Braintree platform) unavailable due to maintenance
Route 73 experiencing delays of up to 20 minutes
Route 240 experiencing delays of up to 20 minutes due to disabled bus
Route 101 experiencing delays of up to 20 minutes due to traffic
Lowell Line Train 1305 (10:30 am from North Station) is operating 5-15 minutes late between Anderson/Woburn and Lowell.
Haverhill Line Train 1204 (10:35 am from Haverhill) is operating 5-15 minutes behind schedule between Andover and North Station.
Route 1 experiencing delays of up to 25 minutes due to traffic
